full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SNGON 'GRO KHRID CHEN BZHI LAS, RDOR SEMS SGOM BZLAS KYI DMIGS RIM BSHAD PA NYES LTUNG DRI MA 'KHRUD PA'I DAG 'BYED MAN NGAG RGYUN BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @028A *, ,(CES SNGON 'GRO KHRID CHEN BZHI LAS RDOR SEMS BSGOM BZLAS KYI DMIGS RIM BSHAD PA NYES LTUNG DRI MA 'KHRUD PA'I DAG BYED MAN NGAG RGYUN BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MANG THOS GDAMS DON 'CHAR BA'I BLO GROS CAN, JA ROD ZHABS DRUNG 'JAM DBYANGS TSE LDAN DANG, TSE'I RIG BYED LA MKHAS PA'I RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA 'JAM DBYANGS BLO BZANG SOGS, SLOB MA DU MAS BSKUL NGOR, ^CHOS SMRA BA'I BTZUN GZUGS GSER TOG SPRUL MING 'CHANG BA BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSOS GZIMS CHUNG BKRA SHIS GA-YANG 'KHYIL GYI YANG RTZER SBAYR BA'O,,) ,,TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA SE CHEN RGYAL KHAG GI ,BSTAN PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHEN PO T'A CANG JUN, SE CHEN P'E LE TSE RING BSAM GRUB DANG, GA-YUNG DRUNG RDO RJE YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO BCAS, MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE DPAR DU BSGRUB PA'I DGES, SKYE BA'I PHRENG BAR DAL 'BYOR RTEN BZANG THOB, DRIN CAN BLA MA MCHOG DANG MI 'BRAL ZHING, SA LAM YON TAN YONGS SU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,
author_simple: GSER TOG NO MON KHAN BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RGYA MTSO,
